hero.welcomeText: Our daily bread is to connect right people in Poland and America in their desire to create and tighten bonds in business, culture or simply in <1> bringing communities together</1>

president.title: President
president.bio-part1: A professional with a robust background in public relations, communication, and diplomacy.
president.bio-part2: As a journalist, he contributed to prominent Polish radio stations and publications, focusing on humanitarian and development issues. He joined LOT Polish Airlines in 2014 and ascended to the position of Communications Director and spokesperson. Notably, he was instrumental in the "Bez wiz do USA" campaign, which played a pivotal role in Poland's inclusion in the U.S. Visa Waiver Program.
president.bio-part3: From March 2020 to June 2024, he served as the Consul General of Poland in New York City. During his tenure, he focused on supporting the Polish diaspora, enhancing Polish-American relations, and fostering cultural and economic ties.
president.bio-part4: He holds a Bachelor's degree in Social Sciences from the University of Warsaw and a Master's degree in International Relations from Collegium Civitas.

vicePresident.title: Vice President
vicePresident.bio-part1: A professional with a proven track record in PR and strategic advisory roles.
vicePresident.bio-part2: Throughout his career, he has held managerial positions across a range of sectors, including business development and analysis at a development agency, PR and economic affairs in a diplomatic capacity in New York, strategy and foreign media relations at the Prime Minister's Office in Poland. In these roles, he has authored and contributed to policy documents, reports, and impactful political speeches. He has been also responsible for coordinating top-tier international political and business delegations, running PR campaigns in US and Poland, and closely with leading global media outlets.
vicePresident.bio-part3: He holds a Master’s degree in Law from the University of Warsaw and completed an executive leadership program at Stanford University’s Graduate School of Business.

generalConsulting.title: General Consulting
generalConsulting.textContent: We help you take your first steps abroad with confidence. From validating your business assumptions to reviewing and improving your expansion model, we provide guidance at every stage. Our support goes beyond paperwork - we connect you with professionals and partners who know how to make things happen.
generalConsulting.textContent2: Among our network are dual-licensed lawyers (U.S. and Poland), grant specialists, and experienced business analysts. We combine practical insights with trusted connections to support your success on new ground.

strategyConsulting.title: Strategy Consulting
strategyConsulting.textContent: Our team combines analytical rigor with real-world business experience. We help you build or refine strategies based on a clear understanding of your market, opportunities, and risks.
strategyConsulting.textContent2: From drafting strategy documents to assessing existing plans, we deliver grounded, actionable advice backed by years of consulting and operational expertise.

businessAdvisory.title: Business Advisory
businessAdvisory.textContent: We navigate the systems that support investment and entrepreneurship: economic agencies, trade associations, local chambers, and state development structures. We know how these institutions work and how to align your goals with available resources.
businessAdvisory.textContent2: Working with experienced analysts, we offer practical advice on obtaining grants, accessing funding or understanding procurement systems in both Poland and the U.S.

PRMarketing.title: PR & Marketing Consulting
PRMarketing.textContent: Our team, with substantial experience in both public and private sectors, has managed large-scale PR campaigns across both the U.S. and Poland. We have worked with global media outlets and understand how to position your message for maximum impact.
PRMarketing.textContent2: We offer full-service PR support, media relations, marketing strategy development, and communications planning, tailored to your audience and goals, in either market.

workshopsEvents.title: Workshops & Events
workshopsEvents.textContent: We organize events, workshops, seminars, and trainings to build knowledge - from business fundamentals to cultural nuances. Whether you're looking for executive briefings or public events, we help design and deliver formats that meet your goals.
workshopsEvents.textContent2: We also connect you with expert speakers, trainers, and facilitators who bring both expertise and relevance.

researchInsights.title: Research & Insights
researchInsights.textContent: Need tailored research on U.S.–Poland relations or business trends? We prepare clear, well-founded reports, background papers, and market insights to support your decision-making.
researchInsights.textContent2: Our research is always grounded in verified data, relevant context, and practical value.

communityOutreach.title: Community Outreach
communityOutreach.textContent: We’ve worked closely with leading Polish-American organizations and have a deep understanding of key people, networks, and local community dynamics.
communityOutreach.textContent2: Our experience provides access to unique insights and data, helping you connect meaningfully with Polish communities in the U.S.

governmentRelations.title: Government Relations
governmentRelations.textContent: We’ve worked within and alongside government structures, holding executive positions in Poland and collaborating with federal and state agencies in the U.S. This gives us deep insight into public sector culture and protocols on both sides of the Atlantic.
governmentRelations.textContent2: We can help you engage with the right public stakeholders while maintaining the highest professional standards in process and communication.
